title: Vivian's List
description:
From Book 1: 
A NEW YORK TIMES and USA TODAY Bestseller packed with Heat and Heart. 












Her brother's best friend. A list. A love story.
After ending a horrible, scarring relationship, Vivian embraces her freedom by making a sexual bucket list. When her brother's best friend, Liam, finds it, sparks fly and hearts open.Can Vivian heal one steamy encounter at a time?





NOTE: This is book 1 in a two-part series. Dual POV. 18+
author: Haleigh Lovell
